What to Expect

As a beta tester, you'll receive early access to RAFAEL Framework features and updates. You'll be able to test new capabilities, provide feedback, and help shape the future of antifragile system development.

We're looking for developers who are passionate about building resilient systems and are willing to provide constructive feedback. No prior experience with RAFAEL is required - just enthusiasm and a willingness to learn!

Beta testers will receive:

  • Access to private beta releases
  • Invitation to exclusive Slack/Discord channel
  • Monthly Q&A sessions with the team
  • Beta tester badge and recognition
  • Potential for free lifetime access (first 50 testers)
